UPDATE sm_mf_proc SET MP_PR_STATE = 2 WHERE or_id =#{orId}

UPDATE sm_mf_proc_log SET mfl_ed_date = GETDATE(), mfl_work_time = DATEDIFF(MINUTE,mfl_st_date,getdate()) WHERE or_id = #{orId} AND mfl_idx = ( SELECT TOP 1 mfl_idx FROM sm_mf_proc_log WHERE or_id = #{orId} ORDER BY mfl_idx DESC )

UPDATE sm_mf_process_stop SET mfs_state = 2, mfs_re_time = GETDATE(), MFS_REST_TIME = DATEDIFF(MINUTE, MFS_STOP_TIME, GETDATE()) WHERE mfs_idx = ( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_idx FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE or_id = #{orId} ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM sm_mf_proc_log WHERE CONVERT(DATE, mfl_ed_date) = CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE());

SELECT a.or_id , MAX(a.MP_MFNO) AS mp_mfno , MAX(a.MP_PROD_NAME) AS mp_prod_name , MAX(a.MP_QTY) AS mp_qty , MAX(a.MP_PR_STATE) AS mp_pr_state , ISNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_state FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE OR_ID = a.OR_ID ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC ),0) AS mfs_state , MAX(b.mfs_idx) AS mfs_idx , MAX(c.MFL_MANAGER) AS mfl_manager FROM sm_mf_proc a LEFT JOIN sm_mf_process_stop b ON a.OR_ID = b.OR_ID LEFT JOIN sm_mf_proc_log c ON a.or_id = c.or_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.mp_pr_state IN (1) AND ISNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 mfs_state FROM sm_mf_process_stop WHERE OR_ID = a.OR_ID ORDER BY mfs_idx DESC ),0) IN (2,0) GROUP BY a.or_id ORDER BY or_id DESC
